room_title: Escape room "Mission: Space" by Amazing Escape Room in New York
review: We went last night and had so much fun! Second escape room for me and this one was far better. The puzzles and clues are very elaborate and well thought out. I don't want to give anything away but I want to go back and try other rooms they have.

room_title: Escape room "Mission: Space" by Amazing Escape Room in New York
review: Had a great time. Staff was friendly and made our experience very fun. It was kid friendly but tough enough to keep the adults scratching their heads.

room_title: Escape room "Mission: Space" by Amazing Escape Room in New York
review: Always a fun experience at the Amazing Escape Room! Been here 3 times and each time I've experienced a different challenge full of interesting surprises. Definitely recommend to anyone looking for a fun night out while still staying local!
